MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely excavate at an underground cable fault on Corbiston Way, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15pm on Thursday, 18th February 2021
